attributes.action: The Govt must publish on an online map the location of all positive Covid tests.
attributes.additional_details:
If we know the level of Covid-19 locally we can assess the risks and change our behaviour accordingly. 
If there have been no recent positive tests near where you live you will be more prepared to go out. If on the map the next-door town or borough has had a number of recent positive tests, you will know to avoid that area for now and take extra precautions.
Its not perfect but better than what we have, which is little information and a lot of fear and uncertainty. 
We need control of our lives.
attributes.background:
Daily they must publish on an interactive map by postcode each positive test with the age of the person within ranges 0-19, 20-29, etc.
Something on the line of a red dot for each new case, after 7 days it becomes a yellow dot and after a further 7 days it is removed. To be accessed online + app.
